name: WoW Game Data
title: WoW Game Data
description:
Endpoints for World of Warcraft game data.

**Hosts**: Note that Blizzard API request paths follow this format: `{region}.api.blizzard.com/{API path}` (or `gateway.battlenet.com.cn/{API path}` for China). For more information, see the [Getting Started guide](/documentation/guides/getting-started).

**Namespaces:** World of Warcraft Game Data APIs require a namespace as part of the request. Each endpoint below lists the correct namespace to use as a parameter. Namespaces can be submitted as headers (**Battlenet-Namespace: {namespace}**) or as query parameters (**?namespace={namespace}**). See [Game Data APIs](/documentation/guides/game-data-apis) for more details.

Achievement Categories Index.description: Returns an index of achievement categories.

namespace.description: The namespace to use to locate this document.

locale.description: The locale to reflect in localized data.

Achievement Category.description: Returns an achievement category by ID.

{achievementCategoryId}.description: The ID of the achievement category.

id.description: The numeric ID of the achievement.

name.description: The localized name of the achievement.

description.description: The localized description of the achievement.

category.description: The localized category for which this achievement falls under, along with a link for more information.

faction.description: The localized faction of the achievement (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

points.description: The amount of achievement points the achievement is worth.

criteria.description: The criteria required to obtain the achievement.

rewardDescription.description: A localized description of the reward for completing the achievement.

rewardItem.description: A localized item that the achievement awards for completion, along with a link for more information.

guildRewardItems.description: A list of localized items that a guild achievement awards for completion, if applicable, along with a link for more information.

prerequisiteAchievement.description: A localized achievement that is required to complete this achievement, along with a link for more information.

nextAchievement.description: The next achievement to be acquired in the chain.

media.description: A link to associated media for the achievement.

accountWide.description: If true, the achievement is account-wide.

hiddenUntilEarned.description: If true, the achievement is hidden until it is earned.

rootCategories.description: A complete list of all top-level achievement categories.

guildCategories.description: A complete list of all guild achievement categories.

categories.description: A complete list of all non-guild achievement categories and subcategories.

Achievement Categories.description: A collection of categories for which achievements fall under.

id.description: The numeric ID of the achievement category.

name.description: The localized name of the achievement category.

achievements.description: A list of localized achievements under this category with links for more information.

subcategories.description: A list of subcategories under this category with links for more information.

parentCategory.description: A link to this category's parent, if applicable.

aggregatesByFaction.description: An aggregated summary of achievement category data for each faction.

guildCategory.description: If true, this category is for guild achievements.

category.description: A link to the achievement category for this aggregate.

Achievement Category Aggregate.description: An aggregate of data for achievement categories.

id.description: The numeric ID of the criteria.

description.description: A localized description of the criteria.

amount.description: The amount that has been completed for the criteria.

operator.description: The operation that this criteria must perform to be completed.

childCriteria.description: A list of children criteria required to complete this criteria.

faction.description: The localized faction of the criteria (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

showProgressBar.description: If true, this achievement should show a progress bar along the path for obtaining all of this criteria.

achievement.description: The localized achievement for which this criteria pertains to, along with a link for more information.

gold.description: If true, this achievement is tracking in-game gold.

Achievement Criteria.description: Criteria required to acquire a World of Warcraft achievement.

id.description: The numeric ID of the criteria.

amount.description: The amount that has been completed for the criteria.

childCriteria.description: A list of children criteria required to complete this criteria.

completed.description: If true, the criteria is fully completed.

Achievement Criteria Progress.description: Progress toward a World of Warcraft achievement.

Achievement Event.description: A World of Warcraft achievement coupled with point-in-time event information.

id.description: The numeric ID of the achievement.

criteria.description: The criteria required to progress the achievement.

completedTimestamp.description: The time the achievement was completed, if applicable.

Achievement Progress.description: A World of Warcraft achievement coupled with the criteria for its progress.

character.description: The character that the achievements belong to.

guild.description: The guild that the achievements belong to.

totalQuantity.description: The total number of completed achievements.

totalPoints.description: The total number of achievement points.

achievements.description: The list of achievements and their details.

categoryProgress.description: The list of achievement categories and their progress.

recentEvents.description: Recent achievement events that have occurred, sorted descending by timestamp.

Achievement Summary.description: A summary of achievements for a World of Warcraft character or guild.

tiers.description: A list of localized PvP tiers with links for more information.

Achievements.description: A collection of World of Warcraft PvP tiers.

key.description: The key to the linked document.

name.description: The name of the linked document.

id.description: The numeric ID of the linked document.

realm.description: The realm in which the linked object resides.

level.description: The level of the linked character.

playableClass.description: The playable class of the linked character.

playableRace.description: The playable race of the linked character.

CharacterLink.description: A link to a character on a specific realm.

id.description: The numeric ID of this connected realm.

population.description: The population of this connected realm.

queue.description: If true, this connected realm is currently queuing.

status.description: The current status of the connected realm.

realms.description: The list of realms belonging to this connected realm.

mythicLeaderboards.description: A link to the index of Mythic Keystone Leaderboard dungeons for this connected realm.

ConnectedRealm.description: A group of realms in which residing characters can interact.

connectedRealms.description: A list of all connected realms.

ConnectedRealms.description: An index of all connected realms.

id.description: The numeric ID of the creature.

name.description: The localized name of the creature.

type.description: The localized type of this creature, along with a link for more information.

family.description: The localized family of this creature, along with a link for more information.

creatureDisplays.description: A list of links to the creature display media items for this creature.

families.description: A list of localized creature families with links for more information.

Creature Families.description: A collection of World of Warcraft creature families.

id.description: The numeric ID of the creature family.

name.description: The name of the creature family.

specialization.description: A localized pet specialization for this creature family, along with a link for more information.

media.description: A link to the media for the creature family.

Creature Family.description: A category that a World of Warcraft creature belongs to.

id.description: The numeric ID of the creature type.

name.description: The name of the creature type.

Creature Type.description: A type for a World of Warcraft creature.

types.description: A list of localized creature types with links for more information.

CreatureTypes.description: A collection of World of Warcraft creature types.

keystoneAffix.description: The link to the Keystone affix.

startingLevel.description: The Keystone level at which this affix will start to be applied.

CurrentKeystoneAffix.description: The current Keystone affix information for a specific leaderboard or leaderboard period.

alliance.description: The aggregate of data for Alliance.

horde.description: The aggregate of data for Horde.

Factioned Aggregates.description: An aggregate of data for each faction.

alliance.description: The aggregate of data for Alliance.

horde.description: The aggregate of data for Horde.

Factioned AggregatesAchievement Category.description: An aggregate of data for each faction.

id.description: The numeric ID of the guild.

name.description: The name of the guild.

faction.description: The faction of the guild (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

achievementPoints.description: The number of achievement points this guild has.

memberCount.description: The number of members this guild has.

realm.description: The realm this guild is located on.

roster.description: A link to the roster of characters for this guild.

achievements.description: A link to the list of achievements for this guild.

news.description: A link to the news for this guild.

createdTimestamp.description: The timestamp for the creation of this document.

documentType.description: The type of this document. Always "guild".

Guild.description: A single World of Warcraft guild.

emblem.description: The icons that makes up the center of the guild crest.

border.description: The border that makes up the outside of the guild crest.

background.description: The background of the guild crest.

Guild Crest.description: The symbol representing a World of Warcraft guild.

color.description: The RGBA color of the component.

id.description: The numeric ID of the component.

media.description: A link to the media URL for the component.

Guild Crest Component.description: An individual component that forms a section of a World of Warcraft guild crest.

emblems.description: The list of icons that make up the center of the guild crest.

borders.description: The list of borders that make up the outside of the guild crest.

Guild Crest Components.description: A list of components that can be combined to form a World of Warcraft guild crest.

character.description: The character that the member represents.

rank.description: The member's rank in the guild.

id.description: The numeric ID of the guild member.

Guild Member.description: A member of a World of Warcraft guild.

guild.description: The guild that this roster belongs to.

members.description: The list of characters in the guild.

Guild Roster.description: A roster of characters for a World of Warcraft guild.

id.description: The ID of this type.

type.description: The constant value representing this type.

IdentifiedType.description: A type representing constant game values (e.g., 'ItemQuality' or 'PlayerFaction').

type.description: The constant value representing this type.

assets.description: The list of assets pertaining to this media item.

Media.description: A World of Warcraft media item.

key.description: A key to the linked document.

name.description: The localized name of the linked document.

id.description: The ID of the linked document.

slug.description: The slug used to identify and represent the document.

content.description: The inline assets from a media item.

MediaLink.description: A link to a media item.

id.description: The numeric ID of the mount.

name.description: The localized name of the mount.

description.description: The localized description of the mount.

creatureDisplays.description: A list of links to the creature display media items for this mount.

mounts.description: A list of localized mounts with links for more information.

Mounts.description: A collection of World of Warcraft mounts.

currentLeaderboards.description: A list of all Mythic Keystone dungeon leaderboards.

MythicLeaderboards.description: An index of all Mythic Keystone dungeon leaderboards available on a specific connected realm.

ranking.description: The overall ranking of this group for this Mythic Keystone dungeon leaderboard.

duration.description: The time in seconds it took to complete the dungeon.

completedTimestamp.description: The timestamp when this dungeon was completed.

keystoneLevel.description: The level of the Keystone that was used to run this dungeon.

members.description: A list of all members of the group.

MythicLeadingGroup.description: A ranked group of characters that completed a Mythic Keystone dungeon.

profile.description: The profile of the current group member.

MythicLeadingGroupMember.description: A member of a ranked leaderboard group.

id.description: The numeric ID of the pet.

name.description: The localized name of the pet.

description.description: The localized description of the pet.

creatureDisplay.description: A link to the media document containing any media assets for the pet.

battlePetType.description: The localized battle type of the pet.

abilities.description: A list of the abilities that the pet can perform.

capturable.description: If true, the pet is capturable.

hordeOnly.description: If true, the pet is Horde only.

battlepet.description: If true, the pet is a battle pet.

allianceOnly.description: If true, the pet is Alliance only.

tradable.description: If true, the pet is tradable.

pets.description: A list of localized pets with links for more information.

Pets.description: A collection of World of Warcraft pets.

races.description: A list of localized playable races with links for more information.

Playable Race.description: A collection of World of Warcraft playable races.

character.description: A link to the character for this PvP bracket entry.

faction.description: The localized faction of the entry (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

bracket.description: The type of PvP bracket this entry pertains to.

seasonMatchStatistics.description: The season match statistics for the entry.

weeklyMatchStatistics.description: The weekly match statistics for the entry.

updated.description: The timestamp this document was last updated.

rank.description: The rank of the entry on the associated PvP leaderboard.

tier.description: A link to the tier that this entry's rank has earned them.

season.description: A link to the season this entry participated in.

PvP Bracket.description: Information pertaining to an entry on a PvP leaderboard.

name.description: The name of the PvP leaderboard.

bracket.description: The bracket type for the PvP leaderboard.

entries.description: The list of entities on the PvP leaderboard.

PvP Leaderboard.description: A leaderboard for a PvP bracket in World of Warcraft.

season.description: A link to the PvP season for these leaderboards.

leaderboards.description: A list of PvP leaderboards with links for more information.

PvP Leaderboards.description: A collection of PvP leaderboards in World of Warcraft.

PvP Match Statistics.description: The statistics for a PvP match.

bracket.description: The bracket type for which this reward is given.

achievement.description: The localized achievement for this reward, along with a link for more information.

ratingCutoff.description: The rating cutoff above which characters receive this reward.

faction.description: The localized faction of the reward (e.g. ALLIANCE or HORDE).

PvP Reward.description: A reward for a PvP season in World of Warcraft.

season.description: A link to the PvP season for these rewards.

rewards.description: A list of PvP rewards with links for more information.

PvP Rewards.description: A collection of PvP rewards in World of Warcraft.

id.description: The numeric ID of the PvP season.

seasonStart.description: The timestamp of the start of the PvP season.

seasonEnd.description: The timestamp of the end of the PvP season.

leaderboards.description: A link to the leaderboards for this PvP season.

rewards.description: A link to the rewards for this PvP season.

PvP Season.description: A PvP season in World of Warcraft.

seasons.description: A list of seasons with links for more information.

currentSeason.description: A link to the current PvP season.

PvP Seasons.description: A collection of PvP seasons in World of Warcraft.

id.description: The numeric ID of the PvP tier.

name.description: The localized name of the PvP tier.

bracket.description: The bracket type that this PvP tier pertains to.

minRating.description: The minimum rating required to be in the PvP tier.

maxRating.description: The maximum rating to be in the PvP tier.

media.description: A link to associated media for the PvP tier.

ratingType.description: Identifies similar PvP tiers across different PvP brackets.

PvP Tier.description: A ranking tier for a PvP season in World of Warcraft.

g.description: The green component of the RGBA color.

r.description: The red component of the RGBA color.

a.description: The alpha component of the RGBA color.

b.description: The blue component of the RGBA color.

RGBA Color.description: A color represented in RGBA color space.

connectedRealm.description: The parent connected realm that contains this realm.

name.description: The name of this realm.

category.description: A custom geographic grouping for this realm.

locale.description: The default locale of this realm.

timezone.description: The default timezone of this realm

type.description: The playstyle supported on this game realm.

tournament.description: If true, this is a designated tournament realm.

openDate.description: The date this realm came online.

slug.description: The slug used to represent or identify this realm.

Realm.description: A single instance of the World of Warcraft game world.
